Name: Drake Corsair
Description:
Manufacturer: Drake Interplanetary
Focus: Exploration

Heed the call of uncharted space and harness the spirit of exploration with the Drake Corsair. Utilizing a unique asymmetrical hull design, this versatile explorer can go wherever the winds of adventure may steer you.
